TopicTitle: A way to force the game to reattach struts?

Articles.Content:
So, I've imported my save from 0.25 to 0.90 but have had a strange effect happen. All struts on craft in flight are visible, but do not seem to be applying any actual structural force. It's like they are not there. When things are detached (docking or separators) the struts stay there, floating on the craft.

Is there a way to try and reset the craft while in flight?
There's probably not a lot you can do, save re-attaching all the struts manually in the editor. :/
As said, it's a craft in flight. Graphics show attached, but craft wobbles around them (they stay stationary).

So, I've imported my save from 0.25 to 0.90 but have had a strange effect happen. All struts on craft in flight are visible, but do not seem to be applying any actual structural force. It's like they are not there. When things are detached (docking or separators) the struts stay there, floating on the craft.

Is there a way to try and reset the craft while in flight?

Had partially the same problem, struts did not break after decoupling. Think I posted it here, this was on a ship built after 0.90.

I think I solved the problem by closing the game out and restarting KSP, IIRC, partial (leaving game and restarting game) did not work.
